title: Atlassian | P40 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BE in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 5
Prior Experience: SDE-2 Amazon


---
**Current CTC**
Base Salary : 4000000
Stock Bonus : ~2000000
Total Comp : ~6000000

----
**Offer**
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Atlassian
Title/Level: SDE-2/P40
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 4750000
Stock bonus: $77.5K stock grant vested over 4 years equally. (~1580000 / year)
Bonus: 712500 (Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year)
PF: 320000 (This is separate from base salary)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~74L
Other details: Negotiated once, original offer had base of 45L. 

**Accepted the offer**
**Note** : For stocks, Atlassian does not give specific stock units, but during vesting will provide RSU worth of vesting amount. So even if stock goes up or down, you will still get the same amount.

title: Google | SWE Intern | Blr/Hyd/Pune
content:
* Education: Btech from a 3rd tier university
* Years of Experience: 1
* Prior Experience: Interned at startups / freelance
* Date of the Offer: July, 2024
* Company: Google 
* Title/Level: SWE Summer Intern
* Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad/Pune
* Salary: 14.8 LPA
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 55k (relocation) +1.65L (housing) = 2.2L
* Stock bonus: N/A
* Bonus: N/A
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  3.28L (12 week intern) + 2.2L (one time) =5.48L
* Benefits: Food, Travel, etc.
* Other details: Applied off campus via referral

title: Amazon | SDE2 (L5) | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 6 Yr
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L5)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 44 LPA
Sign On Bonus: 13 LPA first yr
Relocation Bonus: 1.5 LPA
Bonus: 250 RSU
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 59 LPA first Yr
Benefits: Amazon usual benefit

Currently working WFH for a US based company current salary 36LPA fixed + 10 Lakh worth of ESOP, should i leave my cozy WFH job to 5 days WFO amazon.
